description:
Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files. 
	Aspose.Email makes it easy to work with HTML or plain text emails and their attachments. It allows developers to work against SMTP, POP, FTP and Microsoft Exchange servers. It supports mail merge and iCalendar features, customized header and body, retrieving content, header information and embedded files and much more.
releaseNotes:
New features:
NETWORKNET-33186 - Implemented InternetMessageId property in Aspose.Email.Outlook.Pst.MessageInfo
NETWORKNET-11363 - Added timezone information in Appointment Request

Enhancements:
NETWORKNET-33176 - Improved PST reading performance

Bug fixes:
NETWORKNET-33217 - OutlookPSTFileViewer demo included in Aspose.Email for .NET installer does not compile
NETWORKNET-33180 - TO field is duplicated in EML
NETWORKNET-33177 - MailMessage does not show attachments of EML
NETWORKNET-33175 - Bad PR_NORMALIZED_SUBJECT_W
NETWORKNET-33165 - Check the presence of Mail Internet Headers before converting to MHT
NETWORKNET-33143 - The problem of PST file display in Outlook

Exceptions:
NETWORKNET-33203 - InvalidOperationException: at FolderInfo.RetrieveFullPath() while parsing OST
NETWORKNET-33189 - OverflowException: at PersonalStorage.ExtractMessage(MessageInfo)
NETWORKNET-33188 - NullReferenceException: at FolderInfo.DeleteChildItem(MessagInfo.EntryId)
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within .NET applications
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
